attributes.title: don’t download 😡😡
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to watch fancams 💕of my beloved 🥰cheeto 🍊man, however, that is NOT(😔) what i got. this app took 420 days to download, and even after it did, it wouldn’t stop crashing🤬😡. when i first opened this app, i received a message telling me that the virus 🦠 and masks 🎭 are a hoax 🕵️‍♂️and that i should drink bleach💉?? also i was not bombarded with the cheeto fancams i was promised😤😤, where r they?? 🧐 also,, ive noticed that my phone has been sending me weird messages in foreign languages after downloading. 🤯🤔is this app rigged🤥? r they stealing my information😦😯? also i don’t know who made this app but it was NOT 🙅‍♀️👩‍🦯my favorite cheeto looking president. 😡🤬 the app is always asking me for money 💰 and to donate 💵 ?? what am i donating to? my fellow cheeto supporters💕🎃, i do not recommend this app. this app was probably made by FAKE NEWS,, and they want to steal our well earned $$ 💵 💰 and secret information 🥴🍤, do NOT fall for their tricks🤡🤡!!

attributes.title: Horrible app from a fellow trumpet
attributes.review:
This app is horribly designed it has no pizzazz or fashionable attachments to it he’s a very rich me and he can afford to add some flavor to this app now I’m off for a trump 2020 but at this point I’m thinking about voting Democrat don’t tell my husband the facts are he makes horrible apps and you can tell they’re made by a Chinese company which he bashes all the time on the news and I’m pretty sure this app sells your information to the Russians ,the Soviets right now neo-Nazis are probably running this app and as a fellow white supremacist who loves racism I am all for it. As we all know Trump is a sexual offender and I just feel like as a country we forgot just had to remind America of what great leader ship we have at this time with them a rapist and a racist in office. 
In fact he couldn’t even pass his SATs without the help of a cheating which is horrible but again great leader ship we have here in these United States of America we are number one in Covid cases which I think will show just how great of a country we are and for my newer generations I would like to let you all know that the trump administration has made it legal to discriminate against LGBTQ community in the medical field and also he is thinking about banning Tiktok.

attributes.title: Terribly disappointed
attributes.review: As a Trump supporter this made me sick all of my info was stolen and sent off if I could give it a lower rate I would. I thought an app for trump would be great and would be wonderful to show my support but as I was looking through I found some horrendous images of trump and sadly have to delete the app immediately it is absolute garbage.🤢🤮

attributes.title: One of the worst apps i’ve ever downloaded
attributes.review: Quality is awful. The app is so clearly riddled with bugs and errors. Do not download this app. The app overheated my phone and now my hands hurt.

attributes.title: Don’t get this app
attributes.review: This app is by far the worst app I’ve ever downloaded, I’ve been using apple products since 2012 and I’ve had hundreds of apps downloaded and I’ve never had an issue with any of them up until now, not only is this app Donald trump who’s one of the worst people to ever walk on this planet, it’s super bias, it feels unwelcoming to anyone who’s not white, straight, Christian, and a man. This app promotes hate, and I don’t think it falls under the values of apple. To add on since I’ve downloaded it I’ve had multiple apps crash and this apple also crush, with all the money and resources Donald had I think this could’ve been managed better, also a man with a degree or whatever shouldn’t be so closed minded, how upsetting, don’t get this app. Lastly i saw 3 slurs, wth
